alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Madison (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 06 at 12:43PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM EXTENDED UNTIL 4 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Localized flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Low lying areas along the Henry`s Fork near and just upstream of St. Anthony. * WHEN...Until 400 PM MST Friday. Flooding may continue beyond this time, and additional extensions of this advisory are possible. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is occurring in low-lying areas along the river, affecting at least one outbuilding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1233 PM MST, local officials reported an ice jam continues along the Henry`s Fork just northeast of St. Anthony. Minor flooding is occurring. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe. Do not approach or enter flood waters. Please report any observed flooding to local emergency services and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service in Pocatello, when you can do so safely.
